sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT T1.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD, T1.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE, T1.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_NM, T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE, T1.REG_USR, TO_CHAR(T1.REGIST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REGIST_DT, T1.UPD_USR, TO_CHAR(T1.UPDT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPDT_DT, '[' || T1.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE || ']:' || T2.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE_NM AS MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE_NM, (CASE WHEN T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE='M' THEN '[M]:마린센터' WHEN T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE='E' THEN '[E]:전기시설' ELSE '[' || T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE || ']:' || 'UNKNOWN' END) AS MNG_FEE_JOB_SE_NM FROM MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE_F T2 ON (T1.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE=T2.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE) WHERE 1=1
AND T1.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD LIKE '%' || #sMngFeeFcltyCd# || '%'
AND T1.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE LIKE '%' || #sMngFeeFcltySe# || '%'
AND T1.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #sMngFeeFcltyNm# || '%'
AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE LIKE '%' || #sMngFeeJobSe# || '%'
ORDER BY T1.MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD_F WHERE 1=1
AND MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD LIKE '%' || #sMngFeeFcltyCd# || '%'
AND MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE LIKE '%' || #sMngFeeFcltySe# || '%'
AND MNG_FEE_FCLTY_NM LIKE '%' || #sMngFeeFcltyNm# || '%'
AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE LIKE '%' || #sMngFeeJobSe# || '%'
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD_F ( MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD, MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE, MNG_FEE_FCLTY_NM, MNG_FEE_JOB_SE, REG_USR, REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #mngFeeFcltyCd#, #mngFeeFcltySe#, #mngFeeFcltyNm#, #mngFeeJobSe#, #regUsr#, sysdate )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD_F SET MNG_FEE_FCLTY_NM = #mngFeeFcltyNm# , MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# , UPD_USR = #updUsr# , UPDT_DT = sysdate WHERE MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD = #mngFeeFcltyCd# AND MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE = #mngFeeFcltySe#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD_F WHERE MNG_FEE_FCLTY_CD = #mngFeeFcltyCd# AND MNG_FEE_FCLTY_SE = #mngFeeFcltySe#
